dlentry.dd: The “Save View Settings” feature introduced in version 1.1.09 operated on file save, and wasn’t very easy to use. This update adds this feature as a new command so you can easily specify when to save the view settings.

dlentry.dt: Restore Previous View Settings option renamed to Restore Saved View Settings.
dlentry.dd: Renamed the option to align with the new like-named command. If this setting is enabled, the view settings saved with the Save View Settings command are applied to files as they are opened.

dlentry.dt: Save View Settings includes attribute display options.
dlentry.dd: The Save View Settings command now saves the attribute display option setting.

dlentry.dt: Open Maps in Document View (FM9) works for submaps.
dlentry.dd: Opening a submap from a topicref in a map will open and honor the Open Maps in Document View setting.
